item.title: How Claude Code Helped Ship an Image Generation Feature in Half the Time
item.description: I leveraged Claude Code to implement an AI image generation feature for Mytoori, comparing different AI models and sharing key learnings.

item.title: Prompt Engineering: Essential Do's and Don'ts for Beginners
item.description: Master the art of prompt engineering with these essential do's and don'ts to get the best results from AI language models.

item.title: Deploy Astro Static on Deno Deploy
item.description: With a little bit of workaround it's possible to deploy a static Astro site to deno deploy. Initially Astro's docs indicated only SSR was supported.

item.title: Applicants demo app
item.description: This is a simple demo app that get's a list of applicants from the server. Those applicants are listed in a table. The user can filter and sort them.
